description: A customizable dropdown menu component used to render a button and toggleable menu. The component supports a 'button' and 'menu' `<slot>` for injecting custom HTML content.

properties.name: buttonAriaLabel
properties.description: The aria-label for the dropdown button.

properties.name: buttonColor
properties.description: The color variant of the button.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the host element.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the button will be disabled.

properties.name: menuBordered
properties.description: Indicates that the menu should have a border.

properties.name: menuOffset
properties.description: Distance between the button and menu in pixels.

properties.name: menuPlacement
properties.description: The placement of the menu relative to the button.

properties.name: menuVisible
properties.description: Indicates that the menu is visible.

events.name: menuVisibilityChange
events.description: Event emitted when the menuVisible prop changes.
